usage.cn: 当你宽恕的时候，等于释放了一个囚徒，然后你会发现，那个囚徒就是你自己。
usage.eng: When you forgive, you set a prisoner free. And then you discover that the prisoner was you.

usage.cn: 阅读, 发现我们的世界，我们的历史，和我们自己——摘自《Read & Grow Rich》
usage.eng: More than any other mental Activity, reading changes and improves us by forcing us to think, to imagine, to examine, to grow and in the process, to discover our world, our history and ourselves.
